name: UPVC Ball Valve
desc: Durable UPVC ball valve for industrial piping systems. Corrosion-resistant and lightweight, making it ideal for chemical and water applications. Provides smooth operation with minimal maintenance requirements.

name: Butterfly Valves
desc: Efficient butterfly valves suitable for flow control. Designed for tight shut-off and easy operation in water treatment and industrial pipelines. Cost-effective solution with long service life.

name: Globe Valves
desc: Globe valves designed for precise throttling and flow regulation. Commonly used in steam, oil, and chemical industries. Heavy-duty construction ensures durability and high performance.

name: Not Return Valves
desc: Prevents backflow in pipelines, ideal for industrial use. Ensures unidirectional flow to protect pumps and compressors. Easy to install and requires minimal maintenance.

name: Solenoid Valves
desc: Electrically operated valves for automated control. Widely used in water, air, and chemical process industries. Provides fast switching and reliable shut-off.

name: Pneumatic Actuator Ball Valves
desc: Pneumatic actuated ball valves for precise and fast operation. Suitable for high-pressure systems requiring quick response. Durable build ensures long service life in tough environments.

specifications.Applications: Oil & Gas, power plants, automation systems

name: Motorized Control Valves
desc: Motor-driven valves for automated industrial processes. Designed for accurate control of liquid and gas flow. Ideal for integration with SCADA and modern automation systems.
features: Suitable for liquid and gas flow
